Summary: My dog loves it, and it's not hard on my bank account
text:
When my husband finally gave it to getting a dog, I was tasked with finding the best dog food in quality and price. Beneful is what we went with. I can find it easily at Amazon and Wal-Mart and other retailers. My dog - a three-year-old mix, part lab and part basset hound - eats it up, and it's reasonably priced.

The size of this bag is nice, as is the plastic-y packaging with the zipper top which is easy to open and close. We're pleased with it!
